entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
